document.full_text: in a speech days after a disagreement with president mahmoud ahmadinejad, ayatollah ali khamenei said that iran's religious leadership would remain the ultimate authority.
document.title: iranian leader asserts power over president
lines_and_colors: in a speech days after a disagreement with president mahmoud ahmadinejad, ayatollah ali khamenei said that iran's religious leadership would remain the ultimate authority.
